events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle on a rainy day leading to front-end collision damage.
Based on submitted details and photos, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident for further processing.
A claims agent specializing in vehicle accidents was assigned to handle the customer's case promptly.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Request sent for the police report, repair estimates, and photographs for a thorough claim investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of accident damage and the police report.
Claims team initiated investigation to verify damage extent and establish liability based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded showing clear liability and confirming vehicle damage consistent with reported accident.
A settlement offer including repair costs and compensation was proposed to the customer via email.
Customer responded positively, expressing approval of the proposed settlement and appreciation for fast handling.
The claim was officially approved following customer agreement on settlement terms and documentation verification.
Insurance payment reflecting the approved settlement amount was successfully issued to the customer's bank.
The claim file was closed after payment issuance and confirmation that customer was satisfied with the resolution.
All claim documents and case notes were archived securely for record-keeping and future reference.
